list.title: Great app
list.content: I love the workouts. They really do work. Also there is so much variety. Only one thing I wish there where added some more new workouts regularly. That would be great.
list.answer_text:
Hi there!

We pride ourselves on having over 700 workouts on the online student available to all members plus we add regular new workouts to keep everyone satisfied! We also add 4 all new workout schedules every, single week to take away the guesswork and give members a fully diversified range of our workouts to follow. Add to this our programs and member challenges and PBL is an all-round amazing site for one-stop fitness and well-being!

list.author: Schwinn992
list.title: Awesome App!
list.content: Lisa is a gorgeous (inside and out!) Aussie pilates instructor who has transformed her online platform into a seamless app.  She offers hundreds of workouts that are categorized in multiple ways to make finding workouts super easy.  Further, she also has a weekly schedule for those who want more guidance, both for shorter and longer mat workouts and reformer workouts.  She also offers form tutorials and rehab, stretch and meditation workouts.  Lisa‚Äôs gifts of being a great instructor, her beautiful sets (including spectacular outdoor settings from all around the world), variety of offerings make this an excellent value - highest recommendation!

list.author: cryssierose
Skye McIntyre
list.title: Lisa is the absolute best Pilates instructor!!
list.content:
Pilates by Lisa has been part of my daily routine since recovering from spinal surgery in March 2019. 

I absolutely love that I can access the program online at a time that suits me in the comfort of my own home or even when I have travelled. 

At times I have had questions for Lisa about my progress and needed advice about a certain workout and she always responds promptly and with advice to steer me in the right direction. Lisa‚Äôs wealth of knowledge, continually amazes me and most of all her support and encouragement is better then any studio I have been too. 

2.5 years later I am the strongest and fittest  I have ever been and I know this is from my daily Pilates practice. 

Thank you Lisa for creating beautiful, supportive community and an educational platform that compares to no other. 

I continually get asked what my secret is? I am very proud to answer ‚ÄúPilates by Lisa is‚Äù.
